Name: 错误之事
About the game: ● Story introduction 'But when you do evil, don't ask for retribution.' He just wanted to revenge the society. He thought so and did evil things. Because of injustice and abandonment by the society, the fate of social animals should be like this. However, people educated in this highly civilized society can never achieve the so-called revenge. This is the last story of my life in the few days left after my resignation. To be exact, it is about the encounter between the 'I' who has no future and the 'she' who yearns for the future. ● Introduction to the game This is a character adventure game based on the real society. The player, as the former employee of the company, will decide the fate of 'me' and 'her' according to different choices. ● Production personnel: Producer · Script · Performance · Program · UI · Artist · Sound Effect · Music · Editing · Release: Ogasawara Staff: Zhenbai, Fengban, Ogasawara Original CG: Yingfeng, Ogasawara Main interface CG: Xiaoyue, Ogasawara
